grain_clauses.previous_cargo:
LAST 3 CARGOES: CLEAN/HARMLESS/ODORLESS ONLY.
NO FERTILIZERS, CHEMICALS, COAL, OR OTHER CONTAMINATING CARGOES
grain_clauses.trimming: CARGO TO BE PROPERLY TRIMMED, LEVELED AND STOWED IN ACCORDANCE WITH IMSBC CODE
grain_clauses.surveyor: INDEPENDENT SURVEYOR TO BE APPOINTED BY CHARTERERS AT LOAD PORT FOR DRAFT SURVEY AND QUALITY INSPECTION
grain_clauses.documents_time: TIME USED FOR OBTAINING/CHECKING DOCUMENTS AT LOAD PORT NOT TO COUNT AS L/T UP TO MAX 24 HRS
